content.question: In Jean Piagetâ€™s theory of cognitive development, which of the following best exemplifies the concept of accommodation?

choices.label: A newborn touched lightly on the right cheek turns his head to the right.
An infant stops reaching for a toy as soon as it is covered by a cloth.
An infant acquires a fear of heights after learning to crawl.
An infant trying unsuccessfully to suck her fist opens her mouth wider and is successful.

content.answer: An infant trying unsuccessfully to suck her fist opens her mouth wider and is successful.
